name: Paulina
moreInfo: General inquiries before the wedding, logistical questions, and RSVP clarifications. Note: Please contact Paulina only for essential matters, especially on the wedding day.

name: Alejandro
moreInfo: General inquiries before the wedding and any last-minute changes. Note: Please reach out to Alejandro only for urgent matters on the wedding day.

name: Miguel
moreInfo: Transport arrangements, directions, and any questions about parking.

name: Joanna
moreInfo: Guest seating, ceremony etiquette, and handling any unexpected guest needs.

name: Roksana
moreInfo: Assisting guests with language barriers (Polish, Spanish, English). Roxana can help translate and answer any questions in your preferred language.
